data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: As a postgraduate student, there are several rules at my university, and I’d like to introduce some of them. Firstly, all the students are asked to go back and stay in the dormitory before 10 o'clock in the evening and the tutor will punish the students who come back late, besides, our university forbids all the students from cheating in any kind of examinations and the students who are cheating in the examination will be expelled immediately. Personally, I totally agree with these rules because they keep things in order. And in other ways, the regulations can make sure fair competition between students. (103 words)
data.referenceText: Do you agree with all of the rules at your school or your job? Why or why not?
data.referenceTranslate: 你是否同意学校或工作的所有规定?
